title: Akaliza Keza Ntwari writes on women-led innovation - Fondation Botnar

quotes: built by Fondation Botnar, a Swiss-based foundation which acts as a true catalyst in the future of digital innovation in global health.

organizations.name: Maven
quotes: Katherine Ryder, guided by an all-female board, founded Maven. Maven technology provides immediate and continuous lines of communication between patients and providers;

organizations.name: SHEROES
quotes: Created by technology entrepreneur Sairee Chahal, SHEROES is a women-only social networking app which puts innovation at the heart of combating issues derived from gender inequality in India.
